metadata.dc:description: A nutritional inquest was carried out in 1857 children attending kindergartens in Córdoba, Argentina, in 1974. Determinations were made for the socioeconomical level each child belonged (NES) and clinical and anthropometric examinations. Nutritional inquests were carried out in 414 of these children, psychological examinations in 51, and biochemical inquests in 61 children.
metadata.dc:title: Encuesta nutricional realizada en niños concurrentes a jardines de niños de la ciudad de Córdoba.
[Nutrition surveys in children attending kindergartens in the city of Cordoba].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
